description: This file implements the core functions of the Web Resource Owner Object, including creation, initialization, object enrollment, and removal. It defines functions for managing object lifecycle and associated interfaces for a web server component, and contains implementation details such as memory management and interface setup.

classes.name: WEB_RESOURCE_OWNER_OBJECT
classes.description: The main object representing a web resource owner, encapsulating properties and function pointers for managing web resource lifecycle and interfaces.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE WebRooCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new web resource owner object, setting up its base class properties and interface references.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebRooRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the web resource owner object, freeing associated resources and interfaces.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebRooEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Allocates and assigns necessary interface structures to the object, enabling it to handle various web-related functions.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebRooInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the object, setting default properties, function pointers, and establishing thread safety primitives.
